dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5946 IH: To prohibit the diminution of the District of Columbia National Guard.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill
Referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To prohibit the diminution of the District of Columbia National Guard.

section.header: Prohibition of diminution of the District of Columbia National Guard
section.text: Neither the Secretary of Defense nor the Commanding General of District of Columbia National Guard may transfer personnel or equipment of the District of Columbia National Guard toâ€”

paragraph.text: a unit of the Department of Defense; or
the National Guard of another State (as such term is defined in section 901 of title 32, United States Code).
